descriptor: Pb has finished her performance + Rob gives her more advices
M filled her purse w sweets for the kids
R discusses w the zoo employee who tells him where Marcel was found
R announces to the guys that Marcel is the monkey from the beer pub
Pb does a new performance at the library for children... it's not getting better !
the guys watch the series where J plays a neurosurgeon
Erica arrives at J for explanations !
Erica decides to search for the REAL Dr. !
Rob announces to Pb that she is fired
R tells them that Marcel is in New York and that he is in perfect health + gonna be a movie star
Pb is ready to sing + the children followed her to the cafe to listen to her
they go to the film set to see Marcel
They start to sing the Jungle song to attract Marcel to R
They go back to see him the next morning + Marcel doesn't want his favorite toy
